thread.title: Major Fire Update Details - NSW Rural Fire Service
thread.title_full: Major Fire Update Details - NSW Rural Fire Service

title: Major Fire Update Details - NSW Rural Fire Service

organizations.name: major fire update details - nsw rural fire service emergency warning

text:
Emergency Warning - White Cedars Rd, Kains Flat (Mid-Western LGA) 2017-02-12 15:37 Posted: 2017-02-12 15:37 
A bush fire is burning near White Cedars Rd, Kains Flat, north east of Mudgee. The fire is currently out of control. 
Current Situation 
A bush fire is burning near White Cedars Rd, Kains Flat, north east of Mudgee. The fire is currently out of control and is moving quickly in an easterly direction. 
The fire is burning in Catastrophic fire danger conditions. Under these conditions, fires are uncontrollable and move quickly. 
There are properties under threat. 
Telephone warnings are being sent to people in the area. 
People in the area should seek shelter now. It is too late to leave. 
Advice 
Seek shelter now as the fire front arrives. It is too late to leave. 
Other Information - If your life is at risk, call Triple Zero (000) immediately. - Continue to stay up to date with the bush fire situation by checking http://www.rfs.nsw.gov.au , listening to your local radio station or by calling the NSW RFS Bush Fire Information Line on 1800 679 737. - If you live in the area but are away from home, it may not be safe to return to your property. - For information on road closures, check http://livetraffic.rta.nsw.gov.au . Roads may be closed without warning. 
The next update on this fire will be issued by 12/02/2017 16:38 or if the situation changes.
